#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int test,flag=0;
    cin>>test;
    long long int d;
    while(test--)
    {
                 flag=0;
                 scanf("%lld",&d);
                 if(d%4==1)
                 cout<<"YES"<<endl;
                 else if(d==2)
                  cout<<"YES"<<endl;
                  else
                cout<<"NO"<<endl;
 
    }
    return 0;
}
